Attention: Properties: Return value!
Letters to be shown:
Just needed to show the debtor identification in the window titel:
End task condition, can be used to just update the window screen:
TRUE - Window is updated, but doesn't get the focus (task ended)
FALSE - Screen is updated and window gets the focus (cursor appears)
Closing the window can be forced to show, that there isn't any data expected:
TRUE - closes the window no matter if data is availible or not
FALSE - leaves an open window after task end
controls correct restart of the window by mouse click,
returns the status of the window TRUE - open, FALSE - close
is also used as RETURN VALUE!
